title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\ConnectionDraining
name: ConnectionDraining
description:
Message containing connection draining configuration.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.ConnectionDraining

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.draining_timeout_sec
params.description: The amount of time in seconds to allow existing connections to persist while on unhealthy backend VMs. Only applicable if the protocol is not UDP. The valid range is [0, 3600].
